gen:link.msg:message: `NumberOfHousingSwitchedFromGas` MOET gelijk zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfHomesSwitchedConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildren1_NumberOfHousingSwitchedFromGas')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfHomesSwitchedConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildren1_NumberOfHousingSwitchedFromGas return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfHomesSwitchedConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildren1_ChildrenOfNumberOfHousingSwitchedFromGas')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfHomesSwitchedConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildren1_ChildrenOfNumberOfHousingSwitchedFromGas return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NumberOfHousingSwitchedFromGas` MOET ook gerapporteerd worden, omdat minimaal één van de onderliggende waarden van `NumberOfHousingSwitchedFromGas` wordt gerapporteerd. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfHomesSwitchedConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_ChildrenOfNumberOfHousingSwitchedFromGas')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfHomesSwitchedConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_ChildrenOfNumberOfHousingSwitchedFromGas return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfHomesSwitchedConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_NumberOfHousingSwitchedFromGas')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfHomesSwitchedConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_NumberOfHousingSwitchedFromGas return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
